text: When the teacher asked about the homework, Li Hua and Zhang Wei looked at each other, neither of ____ (we) daring to say a word.
analysis: them为人称代词宾格,在介词of后作宾语,指代前面的"Li Hua and Zhang Wei"。

text: As teenagers, ____ should learn to take responsibility for our own choices instead of relying on parents all the time.
analysis: we为人称代词主格,在句中作主语,指代"teenagers"(青少年)。

text: The new library has a lot of interesting books, and most of ____ are suitable for senior high school students to read after class.
analysis: them为人称代词宾格,在介词of后作宾语,指代前面的"books"。

text: My deskmate is good at math, so I often turn to ____ (he) for help when I meet difficult problems in calculations.
analysis: him为人称代词宾格,在介词to后作宾语,指代前面的"deskmate"(同桌)。

text: This book is not mine; it must be ____, for I saw her name on the cover yesterday.
analysis: hers为名词性物主代词,在句中作表语,相当于"her book",表示"她的(书)"。

text: If you don't believe in ____ (you), no one else will trust you in the long run.
analysis: yourself为反身代词,在介词in后作宾语,表示"你自己",强调动作的承受者是动作的执行者本身。

text: The little boy finished the difficult puzzle by ____ without any help from his parents, which surprised everyone around him.
analysis: himself为反身代词,在介词by后作宾语,表示"他自己",强调"独自完成"。

text: The volunteers spent a whole day helping the elderly clean their houses, and ____ (they) were deeply moved by the volunteers' kindness.
analysis: they为人称代词主格,在句中作主语,指代前面的"the elderly"(老年人)。

text: I left my notebook in the classroom yesterday, but I can't find ____ anywhere this morning. Did anyone pick it up?
analysis: it为人称代词,在句中作宾语,指代前面的"notebook"。

text: My parents always tell me that happiness is something that ____ (I) have to create by ourselves, not something that can be given by others.
analysis: I为人称代词主格,在句中作主语,与后面的"ourselves"呼应,表示"我"。

text: The two sisters have different hobbies; one likes painting and ____ prefers playing the piano.
analysis: the other为不定代词,指代"两个中的另一个",与前面的"one"形成对应。

text: The machine is easy to operate, and you can learn to use ____ (it) by following the instructions on the box.
analysis: it为人称代词,在句中作宾语,指代前面的"machine"。

text: Reading widely can not only enrich our knowledge, ____ also shape our thinking and personality in the long term.
analysis: but为并列连词,与前面的"not only"构成"not only...but also..."结构,表示"不仅...而且..."。

text: A ____ (sudden) rain stopped the students from having their sports meeting on the playground as planned.
analysis: sudden为形容词,修饰名词"rain",表示"突然的雨"。

text: The old man ____ has been living in this village for over 60 years knows every story about its history and culture.
analysis: who/that为关系代词,引导定语从句修饰"old man",在从句中作主语。

text: After months of hard training, the girl ____ (success) in passing the important piano examination last week.
analysis: succeeded为动词过去式,与介词in构成固定搭配"succeed in doing",表示"成功做某事"。

text: We have to finish our research report before Friday, ____ we will miss the chance to present it at the school meeting.
analysis: or为并列连词,表示"否则",连接两个并列的句子。

text: The children are playing ____ (happy) in the park, with their laughter spreading everywhere.
analysis: happily为副词,修饰动词"playing",表示"快乐地玩耍"。

text: ____ the sun was shining brightly, the wind was still cold in early spring and we all wore thick coats.
analysis: Although/Though/While为让步连词,引导让步状语从句,表示"尽管...但是..."。

text: It's important for teenagers to take ____ (act) to protect the environment around us in daily life.
analysis: action为名词,与动词take构成固定搭配"take action",表示"采取行动"。

text: The library ____ we often go to read on weekends has just bought a lot of new books and magazines.
analysis: where/which/that为关系代词,引导定语从句修饰"library"。where在从句中作地点状语,which/that在从句中作宾语。

text: You must do your homework ____ (careful) to avoid making unnecessary mistakes in the exam.
analysis: carefully为副词,修饰动词"do",表示"仔细地做作业"。

text: Many students choose to take part in volunteer activities during holidays, ____ they can learn to help others and improve themselves at the same time.
analysis: for/because为原因连词,引导原因状语从句,表示"因为"。

text: The more we communicate with our parents, the ____ (long) the distance between our hearts will become.
analysis: shorter为形容词比较级,与前面的"the more"构成"the more...the more..."结构,表示"越...越..."。

text: ____ you put your heart into your study, you will surely make great progress no matter how difficult it is.
analysis: If/When为条件/时间连词,引导条件/时间状语从句,表示"如果/当你..."。

text: There are many ____ (different) between the two traditional festivals in different parts of our country.
analysis: differences为名词复数,表示"不同之处"。

text: The little girl was crying loudly ____ she couldn't find her mother in the crowded supermarket.
analysis: because/as/since为原因连词,引导原因状语从句,表示"因为"。

text: He left home earlier than ____ (usual) this morning because he had to catch the first bus to school.
analysis: usual为形容词,与than构成固定搭配"than usual",表示"比平时"。

text: The book ____ cover is light blue is a gift from my English teacher on my birthday.
analysis: whose为关系代词,引导定语从句修饰"book",在从句中作定语,表示"书的封面"。

text: The young artist has a ____ (create) mind and he always comes up with unique ideas for his paintings.
analysis: creative为形容词,修饰名词"mind",表示"有创造力的头脑"。

text: We didn't go for a picnic yesterday, ____ the weather was too bad and it rained heavily all day.
analysis: because为原因连词,引导原因状语从句,表示"因为"。

text: English is one of the most important ____ (speak) languages in the world and it's necessary for us to master it.
analysis: spoken为过去分词作形容词,修饰名词"languages",表示"被说的语言"。

text: After school, I usually go to the ____ (home) near our community to buy some exercise books and stationery.（合成名词）
analysis: bookstore为合成名词,由book(书)和store(商店)组成,表示"书店"。

text: We should love our ____ and do what we can to protect its natural environment.（合成名词）
analysis: homeland为合成名词,由home(家)和land(土地)组成,表示"祖国,家乡"。

text: We ordered a ____ and a cup of coffee in the small shop on the street corner when we were tired.（外来词，饮食类）
analysis: pizza为外来词,来自意大利语,表示"披萨"。

text: My English teacher always tells us to keep a ____ (every) diary to improve our writing skills.（合成形容词）
analysis: everyday为合成形容词,由every(每)和day(天)组成,表示"每天的,日常的"。

text: The ____ train from our city to the capital only takes two hours, which is very convenient.（合成形容词）
analysis: high-speed为合成形容词,由high(高)和speed(速度)组成,表示"高速的"。

text: She likes watching ____ in her free time and her favorite one is Swan Lake.（外来词，文化类）
analysis: ballet为外来词,来自法语,表示"芭蕾舞"。

text: The ____ (sun) through the window made the small room warm and bright in the morning.（合成名词）
analysis: sunshine为合成名词,由sun(太阳)和shine(光)组成,表示"阳光"。

text: My deskmate is a ____ friend and she always helps me when I meet difficulties in study.（合成形容词）
analysis: true-hearted为合成形容词,由true(真实的)和hearted(有...心的)组成,表示"真诚的"。

text: We can see a lot of delicious ____ in the Japanese restaurant near the school gate.（外来词，饮食类）
analysis: sushi为外来词,来自日语,表示"寿司"。

text: All the ____ (class) in our grade took part in the sports meeting held last month.（合成名词）
analysis: classmates为合成名词,由class(班级)和mates(伙伴)组成,表示"同班同学"。

text: The old man lives ____ near the park, so he can take a walk there every morning.（合成副词）
analysis: somewhere为合成副词,由some(某)和where(地方)组成,表示"某处"。

text: I need to look up the new word in the ____, or I can't understand the sentence in the passage.（合成名词）
analysis: dictionary为合成名词,由diction(措辞)和ary(场所)组成,表示"词典"。

text: My sister found a ____ (full) job in a company after graduating from college.（合成形容词）
analysis: full-time为合成形容词,由full(全)和time(时间)组成,表示"全职的"。

text: The waiter handed us a ____ and we chose some dishes we liked for dinner.（外来词，餐饮类）
analysis: menu为外来词,来自法语,表示"菜单"。

text: There is a small ____ in our school where we can buy some snacks and drinks.（合成名词）
analysis: snackbar为合成名词,由snack(零食)和bar(吧)组成,表示"小吃店"。

text: I left my pen ____ (some) in the classroom, but I can't find it now.（合成副词）
analysis: somewhere为合成副词,由some(某)和where(地方)组成,表示"某处"。

text: We enjoyed the sweet ____ (black) and beautiful music at the party last night.（外来词，饮食类）
analysis: chocolate为外来词,来自西班牙语,表示"巧克力"。

text: The teacher wrote down the key points on the ____ with a white chalk in the class.（合成名词）
analysis: blackboard为合成名词,由black(黑)和board(板)组成,表示"黑板"。

text: The ____ jacket he is wearing looks very cool and it's popular among teenagers now.（外来词，服饰类）
analysis: jeans为外来词,表示"牛仔裤"。

text: ____ (any), we should finish our homework on time and never put it off until tomorrow.（合成副词）
analysis: Anyway为合成副词,由any(任何)和way(方式)组成,表示"无论如何"。

text: There are many ____ (deer) in the nature reserve on the edge of our city, well protected by the local government.
analysis: deer为单复数同形名词,表示"鹿"。

text: The farmer raised a group of ____ (sheep) on the mountain, and their wool is of very good quality.
analysis: sheep为单复数同形名词,表示"羊"。

text: We can see different ____ of rare fish in the underwater world museum, which amazes all the visitors.
analysis: species为单复数同形名词,表示"种类"。

text: The fisherman caught several big ____ (fish) in the lake this morning and decided to set them free.
analysis: fish为单复数同形名词,表示"鱼"。

text: Every possible ____ has been tried to solve the problem of water shortage in the small village.
analysis: means为单复数同形名词,表示"方法"。

text: A new ____ (series) of English learning videos has been put online and is popular among senior high school students.
analysis: series为单复数同形名词,表示"系列"。

text: Many foreign ____ (Chinese) living abroad still keep the habit of celebrating traditional Chinese festivals.
analysis: Chinese为单复数同形名词,表示"中国人"。

text: This kind of ____ can fly in all kinds of bad weather and is widely used in air transportation.
analysis: aircraft为单复数同形名词,表示"飞机"。

text: Some ____ (Japanese) teachers came to our school for educational exchange and gave us interesting English lessons.
analysis: Japanese为单复数同形名词,表示"日本人"。

text: More and more new ____ of plants are discovered in the rainforest every year by scientists.
analysis: species为单复数同形名词,表示"种类"。

text: China has sent many advanced ____ (spacecraft) into space and made great achievements in aerospace.
analysis: spacecraft为单复数同形名词,表示"航天器"。

text: All the ____ in our class took part in the Chinese poetry recitation contest and won the first prize.
analysis: Chinese为单复数同形名词,表示"中国人"。

text: Taking public transport is one of the green ____ (means) of going out and it can reduce air pollution.
analysis: means为单复数同形名词,表示"方法"。

text: The military ____ parked on the airport tarmac is ready for the training mission at any time.
analysis: aircraft为单复数同形名词,表示"飞机"。

text: A few ____ (Swiss) artists held a painting exhibition in our city and attracted a lot of art lovers.
analysis: Swiss为单复数同形名词,表示"瑞士人"。

text: A ____ of lectures on environmental protection will be held in our school next month.
analysis: series为单复数同形名词,表示"系列"。

text: If you look carefully, you can see a lot of small ____ (fish) swimming in the clear river in the park.
analysis: fish为单复数同形名词,表示"鱼"。

text: The local people use various ____ to keep their traditional culture alive from generation to generation.
analysis: means为单复数同形名词,表示"方法"。

text: Our country has the ability to design and make all kinds of ____ (aircraft) independently now.
analysis: aircraft为单复数同形名词,表示"飞机"。

text: Those rare ____ living in the wetland are under strict protection by the local environmental department.
analysis: deer为单复数同形名词,表示"鹿"。

text: Many ____ (child) in the neighborhood take part in the weekend reading club to develop their reading habits.
analysis: children为child的不规则复数形式,表示"孩子们"。

text: Several ____ (man) volunteers helped move the heavy books to the new library and refused to accept any thanks.
analysis: men为man的不规则复数形式,表示"男人们"。

text: She has to wear comfortable ____ for the long walk, or her feet will get sore on the way.
analysis: feet为foot的不规则复数形式,表示"脚"。

text: The little boy brushed his ____ (tooth) carefully every morning and evening, so he has no bad teeth at all.
analysis: teeth为tooth的不规则复数形式,表示"牙齿"。

text: Some ____ (woman) doctors in the hospital volunteered to go to the mountain village to give free medical treatment to the villagers.
analysis: women为woman的不规则复数形式,表示"女医生们"。

text: The old house is empty for years and there are some ____ running around in the corner at night.
analysis: mice为mouse的不规则复数形式,表示"老鼠"。

text: With the development of society, more and more strange ____ (phenomenon) in nature are being explained by science.
analysis: phenomena为phenomenon的不规则复数形式,表示"现象"。

text: A group of ____ (goose) are swimming on the lake in the park, and they look very lovely in the sunshine.
analysis: geese为goose的不规则复数形式,表示"鹅"。

text: He hurt his ____ when playing basketball yesterday, so he has to walk with a stick these days.
analysis: foot/feet为foot的单复数形式,表示"脚"。

text: The teachers made several new ____ (criterion) for judging the students' comprehensive quality this term.
analysis: criteria为criterion的不规则复数形式,表示"标准"。

text: The local farmers used to raise ____ (ox) to help them plough the fields in the past.
analysis: oxen为ox的不规则复数形式,表示"牛"。

text: The little girl was so scared that she cried when she saw two small ____ in the grass behind the house.
analysis: mice为mouse的不规则复数形式,表示"老鼠"。

text: Different ____ (medium) such as TV, radio and the Internet are used to spread traditional culture now.
analysis: media为medium的不规则复数形式,表示"媒体"。

text: The computer room bought a few new ____ (mouse) to replace the broken ones for students' study.
analysis: mice为mouse的不规则复数形式,表示"鼠标"。

text: The ground is covered with yellow ____ (leaf) in autumn, making the park look very beautiful.
analysis: leaves为leaf的不规则复数形式,表示"叶子"。

text: We need to take a few sharp ____ (knife) to cut the fruit for the picnic this weekend.
analysis: knives为knife的不规则复数形式,表示"刀"。

text: Many brave people risk their ____ (life) to protect the wild animals in the dangerous rainforest.
analysis: lives为life的不规则复数形式,表示"生命"。

text: The students measured their ____ and heights in the physical examination held last week.
analysis: feet为foot的不规则复数形式,表示"脚"。

text: The cake is too big, so we cut it into four ____ (half) and shared it with each other.
analysis: halves为half的不规则复数形式,表示"一半"。

text: Many unknown ____ (hero) have made great contributions to our country's development and we should remember them forever.
analysis: heroes为hero的不规则复数形式,表示"英雄"。

text: We bought some fresh ____ (tomato) from the community market to make tomato and egg soup for dinner tonight.（以o结尾）
analysis: tomatoes为tomato的复数形式,以o结尾的名词变复数时加es,表示"西红柿"。

text: She took a lot of beautiful ____ (photo) when she traveled to the ancient town during the National Day holiday.（以o结尾）
analysis: photos为photo的复数形式,以o结尾的名词变复数时加s,表示"照片"。

text: The cook cut up several big ____ (potato) and fried them with beef for the students' lunch in the school canteen.（以o结尾）
analysis: potatoes为potato的复数形式,以o结尾的名词变复数时加es,表示"土豆"。

text: The kind young nurse looked after several lovely ____ (baby) in the hospital ward and all the parents thanked her sincerely.（以y结尾）
analysis: babies为baby的复数形式,以辅音字母+y结尾的名词变复数时变y为i加es,表示"婴儿"。

text: We need to prepare some paper ____ (box) to store the old textbooks and exercise books in the classroom.（s/sh/ch/x结尾）
analysis: boxes为box的复数形式,以s/sh/ch/x结尾的名词变复数时加es,表示"盒子"。

text: Some ____ (wolf) are often seen in the forest at the foot of the mountain, so local people are warned not to go there alone.
analysis: wolves为wolf的复数形式,以f结尾的名词变复数时变f为v加es,表示"狼"。

text: The kind man prepared a big surprise for his wife on their wedding anniversary, and all his friends and ____ (wife) came to celebrate together.
analysis: wives为wife的复数形式,以fe结尾的名词变复数时变fe为v加es,表示"妻子们"。

text: We need to buy a few new ____ (shelf) for the classroom to put the reference books and exercise books in order.
analysis: shelves为shelf的复数形式,以f结尾的名词变复数时变f为v加es,表示"架子"。

text: The apple pie is too big for one person, so we cut it into six ____ (half) and shared it with our deskmates.
analysis: halves为half的复数形式,以f结尾的名词变复数时变f为v加es,表示"一半"。

text: In late autumn, the ground of the campus is covered with golden ____ (leaf), which is a beautiful scene for us to enjoy.
analysis: leaves为leaf的复数形式,以f结尾的名词变复数时变f为v加es,表示"叶子"。

text: The police caught the two ____ (thief) who stole things in the community supermarket and handed them over to the relevant department.
analysis: thieves为thief的复数形式,以f结尾的名词变复数时变f为v加es,表示"小偷"。

text: Teenagers should learn to know their own ____ (self) and accept their shortcomings while developing their advantages.
analysis: selves为self的复数形式,以f结尾的名词变复数时变f为v加es,表示"自己"。

text: My mother bought three ____ (loaf) of bread from the bakery near our home for our breakfast tomorrow morning.
analysis: loaves为loaf的复数形式,以f结尾的名词变复数时变f为v加es,表示"条"。

text: Several lovely ____ (calf) are running on the grassland with their mothers, and the scene looks very warm and lively.
analysis: calves为calf的复数形式,以f结尾的名词变复数时变f为v加es,表示"小牛"。

text: Many students wear thick ____ (scarf) in winter to keep their necks warm when walking to school.
analysis: scarves/scarfs为scarf的复数形式,可以变f为v加es或直接加s,表示"围巾"。

text: The ____ (roof) of several old houses in the village were repaired by the government, making them safer to live in.
analysis: roofs为roof的复数形式,以f结尾的名词变复数时直接加s,表示"屋顶"。

text: Many brave firefighters risk their ____ (life) to put out the fire and save the people in danger every year.
analysis: lives为life的复数形式,以fe结尾的名词变复数时变fe为v加es,表示"生命"。

text: We need to take a few sharp ____ (knife) to cut the watermelon and other fruits for the class picnic this weekend.
analysis: knives为knife的复数形式,以fe结尾的名词变复数时变fe为v加es,表示"刀"。

text: The scientist showed several solid ____ (proof) to prove his new discovery in the field of biology at the meeting.
analysis: proofs为proof的复数形式,以f结尾的名词变复数时直接加s,表示"证据"。

text: Several ____ (chief) of the company came to our school to talk with students about career planning and job hunting.
analysis: chiefs为chief的复数形式,以f结尾的名词变复数时直接加s,表示"负责人"。

text: The ____ (gulf) between different generations can be narrowed by more communication and understanding.
analysis: gulfs为gulf的复数形式,以f结尾的名词变复数时直接加s,表示"鸿沟"。

text: The children are very interested in the story about the ____ (elf) who live in the magic forest and have special powers.
analysis: elves为elf的复数形式,以f结尾的名词变复数时变f为v加es,表示"精灵"。

text: The farmer tied the wheat into several ____ (sheaf) and put them in the barn after the harvest.
analysis: sheaves为sheaf的复数形式,以f结尾的名词变复数时变f为v加es,表示"捆"。

text: The workers checked all the ____ (safe) in the factory to ensure the safety of the employees during work.
analysis: safes为safe的复数形式,以e结尾的名词变复数时直接加s,表示"保险箱"。

text: My grandmother still keeps some clean ____ (handkerchief) in her drawer, a habit she has kept for many years.
analysis: handkerchiefs/handkerchieves为handkerchief的复数形式,可以变f为v加es或直接加s,表示"手帕"。

text: There ____ (be) a new library and three teaching buildings in our school since 2023.
analysis: has been为there be句型的现在完成时形式,表示"有"。

text: My deskmate ____ (finish) his homework before he watched the basketball match last night.
analysis: had finished为过去完成时,表示"完成"这一动作发生在"看比赛"之前。

text: ____ quiet in the reading room, for everyone is busy reading and studying.
analysis: Keep为祈使句的谓语动词,表示"保持安静"。

text: The number of students who ____ (go) to school by bike is increasing because of the green travel call.
analysis: go为一般现在时,在定语从句中作谓语,表示"去"。

text: My parents ____ (work) in the same hospital for over 20 years and they both love their jobs deeply.
analysis: have worked为现在完成时,表示"工作"这一动作从过去持续到现在。

text: Look! It ____ (rain) heavily outside, so we have to cancel the outdoor sports meeting.
analysis: is raining为现在进行时,表示"正在下雨"。

text: You ____ hand in your exercise books before class, or the teacher will not check them.
analysis: must/should为情态动词,表示"必须/应该"。

text: The students and teachers ____ (plant) more than 500 trees on the hill near the school last spring.
analysis: planted为一般过去时,表示"种植"这一动作发生在过去。

text: As we all ____ (know), traditional Chinese culture is one of the most precious treasures of our country.
analysis: know为一般现在时,表示"知道"。

text: Students ____ (not allow) to use mobile phones in class according to the school rules.
analysis: are not allowed为被动语态,表示"不被允许"。

text: Either my brother or I ____ (come) to pick you up at the bus station this afternoon.
analysis: will come为一般将来时,表示"将要来"。

text: We ____ (learn) English for six years since we entered primary school and we can speak it fluently now.
analysis: have learned/have been learning为现在完成时/现在完成进行时,表示"学习"这一动作从过去持续到现在。

text: If I ____ (be) you, I would take part in the English speech contest to challenge myself.
analysis: were为虚拟语气,表示"如果我是你"。

text: Our school ____ (hold) a sports meeting every autumn and all students take an active part in it.
analysis: holds为一般现在时,表示"举行"。

text: Not only my classmates but also my teacher ____ (help) me with my math problems when I am in trouble.
analysis: helps为一般现在时,在"not only...but also..."结构中,谓语动词与最近的主语一致。

text: The plane ____ (arrive) in ten minutes, so we need to hurry to the boarding gate right now.
analysis: will arrive/is arriving为一般将来时/现在进行时表将来,表示"将要到达"。

text: She ____ (forget) to bring her English textbook to class this morning, so she had to borrow one from her deskmate.
analysis: forgot为一般过去时,表示"忘记"这一动作发生在过去。

text: We ____ (protect) the environment around us, for it's our duty to make the earth a better place.
analysis: must/should protect为情态动词+动词原形,表示"必须/应该保护"。

text: My grandfather ____ (read) a newspaper every morning after breakfast and it's his daily habit.
analysis: reads为一般现在时,表示"读"这一经常性的动作。

text: Our class ____ (win) the first prize in the school singing competition last week and we all felt very excited.
analysis: won为一般过去时,表示"赢得"这一动作发生在过去。

text: The school art festival ____ (hold) in our school every May and it's welcomed by all students.
analysis: is held为一般现在时被动语态,表示"被举行"。

text: A new playground ____ (build) in our school last summer vacation and we can play sports there now.
analysis: was built为一般过去时被动语态,表示"被建造"。

text: The new documentary about Chinese culture ____ (show) in the cinema next week, and I plan to watch it with my family.
analysis: will be shown为一般将来时被动语态,表示"将被放映"。

text: The classroom ____ (clean) by the students at the moment, so we have to wait outside for a while.
analysis: is being cleaned为现在进行时被动语态,表示"正在被打扫"。

text: The problem of students' eye protection ____ (discuss) by our teachers when I passed the office yesterday afternoon.
analysis: was being discussed为过去进行时被动语态,表示"正在被讨论"。

text: The rare wild animal ____ (see) in the forest near our city several times since last year.
analysis: has been seen为现在完成时被动语态,表示"被看见"。

text: The whole work ____ (finish) by the time the teacher came to check our progress last Friday.
analysis: had been finished为过去完成时被动语态,表示"被完成"。

text: English ____ (teach) in almost all middle schools in China and it's an important subject.
analysis: is taught为一般现在时被动语态,表示"被教授"。

text: Many famous teachers ____ (invite) to give lectures in our school during the education week last month.
analysis: were invited为一般过去时被动语态,表示"被邀请"。

text: The broken computer in the classroom ____ (repair) by the worker in two hours, so we can use it in the computer class this afternoon.
analysis: will be repaired为一般将来时被动语态,表示"将被修理"。

text: The ancient buildings in this city ____ (protect) by the local government for many years and they look as good as new.
analysis: have been protected为现在完成时被动语态,表示"被保护"。主语buildings为复数,所以用have。

text: All the students ____ (ask) to take part in the volunteer activity of cleaning the park this weekend.
analysis: are asked为一般现在时被动语态,表示"被要求"。

text: This kind of paper ____ (make) from bamboo and it's very environmentally friendly.
analysis: is made为一般现在时被动语态,表示"被制造"。

text: The students' eyes ____ (examine) by the doctor carefully in the physical examination last week.
analysis: were examined为一般过去时被动语态,表示"被检查"。

text: The letters to the pen friends ____ (send) already ____ and we are waiting for their replies.
analysis: have been sent为现在完成时被动语态,表示"已经被寄出"。第一个空填have,第二个空填been sent。

text: The park ____ (close) because of the bad weather yesterday, so we didn't go there for a walk.
analysis: was closed为一般过去时被动语态,表示"被关闭"。

text: The books in the library ____ (take) out if you show your student card to the librarian.
analysis: can be taken为情态动词+被动语态,表示"可以被借出"。

text: The accident on the road ____ (report) to the police by a driver when it happened yesterday morning.
analysis: was reported为一般过去时被动语态,表示"被报告"。

text: Many Chinese classic works ____ (translate) into different foreign languages and spread all over the world so far.
analysis: have been translated为现在完成时被动语态,表示"被翻译"。

text: The homework ____ (do) by the students before they go to bed every night, which is a good study habit.
analysis: is done为一般现在时被动语态,表示"被完成"。

text: You should listen ____ (careful) to the teacher in class to catch all the key points of the lesson.
analysis: carefully为副词,由形容词careful加-ly构成,修饰动词listen,表示"仔细地"。

text: ____ he will come to our class party this weekend is still a question, for he has a lot of homework to do.
analysis: Whether为连接副词,引导主语从句,表示"是否"。

text: The students finished the group task ____ (quick) and won praise from the teacher for their efficiency.
analysis: quickly为副词,由形容词quick加-ly构成,修饰动词finished,表示"快速地"。

text: Among all the students in our class, Li Ming speaks English the ____ (well), so he is chosen to take part in the speech contest.
analysis: best为副词well的最高级形式,修饰动词speaks,表示"最好地"。

text: ____ you go, you should remember that honesty is the most important quality for a person.
analysis: Wherever为连接副词,引导让步状语从句,表示"无论哪里"。

text: The children talked and laughed ____ (happy) when they went for a picnic in the park last Sunday.
analysis: happily为副词,由形容词happy变y为i加-ly构成,修饰动词talked和laughed,表示"快乐地"。

text: She ____ goes out at night alone, because her parents always tell her it's not safe.
analysis: never/hardly为否定副词,修饰动词goes,表示"从不/几乎不"。

text: The old man walked ____ (slow) along the street, enjoying the beautiful scenery on both sides.
analysis: slowly为副词,由形容词slow加-ly构成,修饰动词walked,表示"慢慢地"。

text: ____ we solve the problem is what we need to discuss at the class meeting right now.
analysis: How为连接副词,引导主语从句,表示"如何"。

text: The teacher explained the difficult grammar point ____ (clear) so that all the students could understand it easily.
analysis: clearly为副词,由形容词clear加-ly构成,修饰动词explained,表示"清楚地"。

text: The more you practice speaking English, the ____ (fluent) you will express yourself in it.
analysis: more fluently为副词比较级,修饰动词express,表示"更流利地"。

text: I haven't heard from my pen friend ____ (recent), so I'm a little worried about him.
analysis: recently为副词,由形容词recent加-ly构成,修饰整个句子,表示"最近"。

text: He studied very hard, but ____ he still failed the math exam because of careless mistakes.
analysis: unfortunately为转折/评注副词,修饰整个句子,表示"不幸的是"。

text: Everyone should speak ____ (polite) to the elderly and show our respect for them.
analysis: politely为副词,由形容词polite去e加-ly构成,修饰动词speak,表示"礼貌地"。

text: To our surprise, the little boy ____ (true) remembered all the English words he had learned in a week.
analysis: truly为副词,由形容词true去e加-ly构成,修饰动词remembered,表示"真正地"。

text: ____ you finish your homework, you can watch your favorite cartoon for half an hour.
analysis: Once为连接副词,引导时间状语从句,表示"一旦"。

text: The athlete trains ____ (hard) every day to realize his dream of winning a prize in the competition.
analysis: hard为副词,修饰动词trains,表示"努力地"。注意hard既是形容词也是副词,不需要加-ly。

text: The street is ____ (usual) quiet in the early morning, with only a few people walking around.
analysis: usually为副词,由形容词usual加-ly构成,修饰形容词quiet,表示"通常"。

text: She is very busy with her study, so she ____ has time to watch TV or play computer games.
analysis: seldom/hardly为否定副词,修饰动词has,表示"很少/几乎不"。

text: If you want to learn a language well, you need to practice it ____ (good) than just memorizing words.
analysis: better为副词well的比较级形式,修饰动词practice,表示"更好地"。
